channel.title: I have 3 questions about coding
channel.description:
So my first question
1. How do i make portals work? (ObjectIds and cases etc...) wasted 2 hours trying to figure out and still dont know how lol
2. How do i change the emote names, and what they do? Cause when i go to the emote list, i want to make an emote called "Train" that teles you somewhere
3. How do i stop an npc from attacking someone and moving out of position?
THANKS!!!!!

item.title: I have 3 questions about coding
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

thanks a ton!!! but just wondering? what should i put in the (10) in (misc.random2(10) == 1 {

??? just a random number???

EDIT:figured out, its the time between talking =)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 03, 2007, 09:46:02 PM[/size][hr]can someone help teach me how portals work?

Read full topic

item.title: I have 3 questions about coding
item.description:
@11131 wrote:

Ok, i know about the portal, but i dont want to go into much detail with that, but number 2 1

NPCHandler.Java

There should be something like

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2741) { if (misc.random2(10) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "yadadada"; } }

Just search for “if (npcs[i].npcType ==” There should be something just abit like the 1 i put in coded box.

npcs[i].textUpdate = "yadadada";; the message “yadadada” is the message change that to your message

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2741) {; the 2741 is the NPC ID

Hope this makes it clear for the number 2 question ;D

Read full topic
